name: Elixir of Swimming
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Elixir of Swimming

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, creator must have 5 ranks in the Swim skill

sections.body: This elixir bestows swimming ability. An almost imperceptible magic sheath surrounds the drinker, allowing him to glide through the water easily (+10 competence bonus on Swim checks for 1 hour).
sections.name: Description
